column4: um.. can someone tell me if there is a way to disable the touchpad mouse of a laptop?
depends on the maker of the laptop
most laptops have a button near the touchpad to disable it
i love my acer... its faster than almost all my friends laptops, but there are some things..like that i dont like
you have to start typing the person's name. its similar to command completion in Terminal
im not familiar with anything yet too much
do you seriously know one of Einstein's relatives? lol I figured he would've found some way to cover his tracks lol
neither am I. Im learning most everything I have said today, I have learned today :P
